parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the line; index begins at 0

title: IDatumTag.IGetLineAtIndex
description: Gets information for the specified line in this datum tag.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the line; index begins at 0

remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles :
[
lineType
,
startPt
[3],
endPt
[3]
]
where:
lineType
Line type as defined in
swLineTypes_e
startPt
[3]
XYZ line start point
endPt
[3]
XYZ line end point
Call
IDatumTag::GetLineCount
before calling this method.
